original_text:
Their heart was not steadfast toward him;
    they were not faithful to his covenant.
korean_text: 이는 하나님께 향하는 그들의 마음이 정함이 없으며 그의 언약에 성실하지 아니하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: Their heart was not steadfast toward him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 마음은 그를 향하여 굳건하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: they were not faithful to his covenant.
